Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Royal Life and Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the comedic and often chaotic life of King Guz, highlighting his daily routines, domestic disputes, and reactions to various challenges, culminating in his resignation.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Debt and Watery Deception
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces King Guz and Alley in a conflict over debt, humorously starting with a supposed drowning and rescue.

sub_scenes.title: King's Daily Life and Domestic Spats
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts the humorous everyday life of King Guz, including his leisure, health complaints, and domestic arguments with the Queen.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Foot Washing Order

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Dispute and its Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This scene presents a comedic dispute among cavemen over clams and the King's brief consideration of intervention before an unexpected resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Chaotic Royal Dinner and Accusations
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a chaotic dinner for King Guz, interrupted by an attack and internal accusations, highlighting the disruptions in his royal life.

sub_scenes.title: King's Meal Demands and Violent Prank Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This scene continues the meal theme, showing the King's demanding nature regarding food and his over-the-top violent reaction to a simple prank.

narrative_arcs.title: Demanding Royal Treatment and Specific Food
Appetizer Satisfaction and Anticipation for Main Course

sub_scenes.title: King's Resignation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This scene concludes King Guz's storyline with his apology for violence and his subsequent resignation, leading to discussions about a new ruler.

narrative_arcs.title: Apology and Job Offer After Violence
King's Relief at Being Ordinary Again

Major_Arcs.title: The Dinosaur Saga: Dinny and the New Dino
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around Alley Oop's dinosaur Dinny, his aging clumsiness, the decision to trade him, and the chaotic test drive of a new dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Clumsiness and Trade Consideration
sub_scenes.description: This scene establishes Dinny's clumsiness as a problem, leading to the idea of trading him for a newer model.

sub_scenes.title: Visiting Honest Zog's Dealership
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Alley and a caveman visiting a dinosaur dealership and being introduced to a new, smaller model.

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Dinny's Acceptance
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows the test drive of the new dinosaur and Dinny's thoughtful acceptance of his potential replacement.

narrative_arcs.title: Compact Dino Test Drive and Initial Impression
Zog's Sales Pitch Confirmation and Ominous Dino

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Fate at the Dealership
sub_scenes.description: This scene focuses on Dinny being marked down for sale at the dealership and considered by another caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Clumsiness and Recognition (Reunion?)
sub_scenes.description: This scene features a clumsy dinosaur being scolded, which turns out to be Dinny, leading to a potential reunion.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Dinny being mistreated and then defended, leading to his reassurance and promised return to Zog.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance and Promise of Reunion with Zog

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Male-Female Dynamics
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores various comedic romantic misunderstandings, jealousies, and male-female interactions, often ending in humorous conflict or realization.

sub_scenes.title: Alley and Coola's Fishing Date Gone Wrong
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Alley's attempt to invite Coola fishing, which quickly devolves into an argument and an abrupt, comical end.

sub_scenes.title: Male Frustrations and Fishing Annoyances
sub_scenes.description: This scene humorously explores general male frustrations with women and specific annoyances during a fishing trip.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Rivalry and Accusations
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces romantic rivalry and accusations of denial and infidelity, leading to arguments and flirtatious interactions.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and its Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a jealous confrontation leading to violence, followed by the cavewoman's clarification and rejection of the aggressor.

sub_scenes.title: Learning and Misinterpreting Romance
sub_scenes.description: This scene focuses on the muscular caveman's misguided attempts to learn romance, leading to humorous and violent misunderstandings.

narrative_arcs.title: Plan to Learn and Apply Romance Techniques

sub_scenes.title: Domestic and Romantic Vignettes
sub_scenes.description: This scene presents a series of short, humorous vignettes related to romantic relationships and domestic discipline.

narrative_arcs.title: Infidelity Accusation and Plea for Forgiveness

Major_Arcs.title: The Twist Dance Craze and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous and perilous craze of 'The Twist' dance, including social pressure to participate and unexpected health hazards.

sub_scenes.title: The Perils of 'The Twist'
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces 'The Twist' dance and immediately highlights its dangerous and injury-inducing nature.

narrative_arcs.title: The Perils of the New Twist Dance

sub_scenes.title: Social Pressure to Dance
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts social pressure to participate in 'The Twist', showing both encouragement and reluctance, and ultimately forced participation.

narrative_arcs.title: Social Pressure and Reluctance to Dance
Forced Participation and Impending Dance Party

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Performance and Hospital Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows the performance of a similar dance ('The Twitch') leading to mockery, humiliation, and widespread injuries requiring hospitalization.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Identity Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a caveman seeking dance lessons for 'The Twitch', experiencing a painful lesson, and a humorous identity reveal of the dance instructor.

narrative_arcs.title: Desire to Learn Dance for Ooola

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel and Research Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around time travel, initially for historical research, but quickly devolving into comedic mishaps and unexpected outcomes.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Planning for Spanish Research
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces the idea of using time travel to research 16th Century Spain and sets the plan in motion.

narrative_arcs.title: The Treatise on Spain and Time Travel Idea
Romantic Encounter with Oop in the Past

sub_scenes.title: The Time Travel Kiss and Accidental Journey
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts the long-awaited kiss between Oop and Oola, unexpectedly triggering time travel to the 20th century due to a malfunctioning time machine.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Tuning and Imminent Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Brief Trip to the 20th Century and Return
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Oop and Oola's brief and bewildered arrival in the 20th century, the explanation of their purpose, and their immediate return to ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment
Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Maintenance and Roman Soldier Mishap
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a later attempt at time travel, resulting in a comedic malfunction that brings a Roman soldier to the present instead of the intended visitor.

Major_Arcs.title: Bullfighting in Ancient Spain
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc unfolds in ancient Spain, centered around a disruptive serenade, Oop's intervention, and an unexpected bullfight with an unlikely hero.

sub_scenes.title: Serenade Disturbance and Oop's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces Oop's arrival in ancient Spain and his immediate involvement in a serenade disturbance, leading to his intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Bewilderment

sub_scenes.title: Consequences of Oop's Intervention and Matador Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This scene details the immediate aftermath of Oop's violent intervention, revealing the serenader to be a famous matador and escalating the consequences for Oop.

sub_scenes.title: The Unlikely Bullfighter and Arena Spectacle
sub_scenes.description: This scene shifts focus to the bullfight, introducing an unlikely replacement bullfighter and the unfolding spectacle in the arena.

narrative_arcs.title: The Injured Matador and a Novelty Replacement
The Unlikely Bullfighter Enters the Arena

Major_Arcs.title: Oop's Return and Jealousy Interrogation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Oop's return from his Spanish mission and the immediate interruption of a promised kiss due to jealousy and suspicion.

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Return and Interrupted Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts the anticipation for Oop's return and the promised kiss, immediately thwarted by jealousy and suspicion.

narrative_arcs.title: Promise of a Kiss and Rescue

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Revolt Comedy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously explores the concept of 'King for a Day', showing the initial ease and subsequent revolt experienced by a temporary king.

sub_scenes.title: The 'King for a Day' Challenge
sub_scenes.description: This scene sets up the 'King for a Day' scenario and the challenge to prove that being king is not an easy job.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day and a Challenge

sub_scenes.title: The King's Revolt Experience
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts the temporary king's immediate experience of revolt and his eventual, somewhat ironic, acceptance of his role.

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act of Forced Shaving
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces and explains the 'Barberous Act', revealing it to be a humorous scenario of forced shaving in a caveman barbershop.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to 'Barberous Act' and Forced Shaving Parlor
sub_scenes.description: This scene sets up the 'Barberous Act' with a prophecy and then reveals the act to be forced shaving in 'MOO TONSORIAL PARLOR'.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to 'Barberous Act' and Romantic Alley
Ooola's Sudden Departure and Justified Violence

Major_Arcs.title: Strange Duck Observation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is a brief, standalone comedic observation of a character labeled 'Strange Duck' and the curious actions of other cavemen.

sub_scenes.title: Measuring 'Strange Duck'
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts cavemen humorously attempting to measure 'Strange Duck' for unknown reasons.
